verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mammun shrujinchina devundu praanamu Nosangi yeppudu kaapaadu mammunu Santosha swara meththuchu Sutinchu chundu daayanan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Palu vidhaalugaa baadhinchu rogamul Pogotti meedanu raakunda jesenu Santosha swara meththuchu Sutinchu chundu daayanan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devundu maatrame rakshana maargamu Naayaththa parachi choopinche maakunu Santosha swara meththuchu Sutinchu chundu daayanan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maa nitya baadhalu vaarinchu koraku Daa sonta putruni bampenesu prematho Santosha swara meththuchu Stutinchu chundu daayanan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ananda mondudi sriyese mokshamu Sarva janaaliki nanugrahinchunu Santosha swara meththuchu Stutinchu chundu daayanan{/lang-eng}
